data.name: XUsedAreaCursor
desc: provides methods to find the used area of the entire sheet.
The used area is the smallest cell range that contains all cells of the spreadsheet with any contents (values, text, formulas) or visible formatting (borders and background color).

methods.name: gotoEndOfUsedArea
desc: points the cursor to the end of the used area.

methods.name: gotoStartOfUsedArea
desc: points the cursor to the start of the used area.
